headline: Some stuff is jank, but it's gonna get better
body: This tool is actively being improved.
You can unlock superpowers like **graph generation** and **image suggestions** by adding your Gemini API key in Settings (press **S**).
Gemini API keys are like passwords Google gives you to use their thingsâ€”they're super easy to get and free!

headline: Arrow keys move between slides
body: Press **?** to see all keyboard shortcuts.

headline: Press E to open the edit drawer
body: This is where you change text, swap layouts, add images.
Press **E** to try it on this slide.

headline: Press T for themes
body: Switch between presets or hit random.

headline: Everything exports as JSON
body: JSON is just a way to list things with basic code.
Press **D** to export your deck. Press **U** to upload one.
AI tools (like ChatGPT) can help edit JSON files if you want.

headline: Everything saves locally
body: Your deck auto-saves in your browser.
Nothing leaves your device unless you export it.

headline: Go make something
body: Click **Back** to start a new deck.
